snippet: A homeless ex-convict was arrested Monday on suspicion of killing a priest with a handgun that had been retrieved by another priest, the police said.
abstract: Arizona police arrest Gary Michael Moran, homeless ex-convict, on suspicion of killing Phoenix priest Rev Kenneth Walker with gun owned by Walker's colleague.
lead_paragraph: A homeless ex-convict was arrested Monday on suspicion of killing a priest with a handgun that had been retrieved by another priest, the police said.

headline.main: Arizona: Suspect Killed Priest With Gun Belonging to Another Priest, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Suspect Killed Priest With Gun Belonging to Another Priest, Police Say
